rev.desc.rev.desc: updated the setup.delete and start.add.loop panels to reference the date variables instead of the techinician variable. If the technician was null then checking the length of the array against this would come out invalid. Therefore, I changed the panels to reference $L.ddates and $L.adates instead because these are always populated whether the user puts the value in or whether the code simply does. This way the lng() of the labor array is always accurate.

Updated the do.delete panel to setup the query for the cmlabor records in pieces. If any piece of the query was null the query would default to 'false' which would obviously not find any records. This would cause cmlabor records to either not get deleted correctly or to get added instead of updated.
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added support for new gl.number column in the labor table.
Will add relevant information to the cmlabor record based on the expense.line.link link record.
Modified to support line-item contract id when provided.
Modified to support CM3 as well as PM with same routine.

descript.descript: updated the setup.delete and start.add.loop panels to reference the date variables instead of the techinician variable. If the technician was null then checking the length of the array against this would come out invalid. Therefore, I changed the panels to reference $L.ddates and $L.adates instead because these are always populated whether the user puts the value in or whether the code simply does. This way the lng() of the labor array is always accurate.

Updated the do.delete panel to setup the query for the cmlabor records in pieces. If any piece of the query was null the query would default to 'false' which would obviously not find any records. This would cause cmlabor records to either not get deleted correctly or to get added instead of updated.
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added support for new gl.number column in the labor table.
Will add relevant information to the cmlabor record based on the expense.line.link link record.
Modified to support line-item contract id when provided.
Modified to support CM3 as well as PM with same routine.
